item.title: OpenAI/GPT: Returning consistent/valid JSON from a prompt
item.description: When using OpenAI it can be tricky to get it to return a consistent response for a prompt. In this blog post, we’re going to learn how to use functions to return a consistent JSON format for a basic sentiment analysis prompt. Let’s start by installing OpenAI and Pandas: pip install openai pandas And now, we’ll open a Python REPl and import the following libraries: import openai import json import pandas as pd We’re going to analyse the sentiment of some reviews from goodreads about The Culture Map book.
